title: Schwartz typographic ephemera
content:
For a few years now, type designer extraordinare Christian Schwartz has been allowing Pinball Publishing to use his fonts, often pre-commercial release, for their literary journal eye~rhyme. Any of the volumes are a nice addition to your typographic library, as well as being well-written compendiums of short fiction and poetry. The latest one utilizes Schwartz's Luxury for the headlines. Take a gander here:  
 [http://pinballpublishing.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014095013/http:/pinballpublishing.com/ "http://pinballpublishing.com/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014095013im_/http:/typophile.com/files/32_large_6275.jpg)
author: ilynam
